title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4007.6 - Veterinarians to be licensed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4007.6 - Veterinarians to be licensed

State Regulations

No owner or trainer or his or her representative shall
employ a veterinarian who is not duly licensed as such by the Department of

Education of the State of New York. Licensed associations shall use all
reasonable efforts to prevent unlicensed veterinarians from practicing on their
premises. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4007.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
